transcription.text: There are three parts to the Reptiles slides, each slide has 4 images. These small slides have red sealing tape around the edges.  These slides form part of The Empire Magic Lantern Outfit with removable chimney and internal wooden block.  The lantern is housed in original box with metal handle, and internal red and blue graphic for: The Empire Magic Lantern Outfit. 20 glass slides in custom box, length of textile to keep box shut, 2 small empty boxes which act to store slides in a snug manner.

work.title: The Empire Magic Lantern Outfit glass slides (Reptiles)
